Package Classes

package Classes
  • Class
    Description
    Event
    Event The Event class represents an event organized within the application.
    EventLists
    EventLists The EventLists class is responsible for managing lists related to event participants, including waiting lists, chosen lists, cancelled lists, and winners lists.
    EventListsManager
    EventListsManager The EventListsManager class manages event lists by interacting with Firebase Firestore.
    EventListsManager.OnEventListsFetchListener
    Listener interface for fetching event data.
    EventListsManager.OnEventListsUpdateListener
    Listener interface for updating event data.
    EventManager
    EventManager The EventManager class manages operations related to events within the application.
    EventManager.OnEventFetchListener
    Callback interface for event fetch results.
    EventManager.OnUpdatePictureListener
    Callback interface for picture update events.
    EventManager.OnUploadPictureListener
    Callback interface for picture upload events.
    Facility
    Facility Facility class locally stores information relevant to specific facilities data: name location description local instance of facility photo list of event ids methods include: constructors getters setters
    FacilityManager
    Facility Manager Facility Manager class handles interactions between the local instance(s) of a given facility with the firestore database data: Firebase Firestore Instance Firebase Storage Reference methods: Constructor checkFacilityExists createFacilityFromDocument addFacility updateFacility deleteFacility getFacility uploadFacilityPicture updateFacilityPictureInFirestore deleteFacilityPicture interfaces: OnFacilityCheckListener OnFacilityFetchListener OnUploadPictureListener OnUpdateListener OnDeleteListener
    FacilityManager.OnDeleteListener
    Interface for handling the result of deleting the facility picture.
    FacilityManager.OnFacilityCheckListener
    Interface for handling the result of facility existence check.
    FacilityManager.OnFacilityFetchListener
    Interface for handling the result of fetching the facility.
    FacilityManager.OnUpdateListener
    Interface for handling the result of updating the facility picture.
    FacilityManager.OnUploadPictureListener
    Interface for handling the result of uploading the facility picture.
    QRcode
    QRcode The QRcode class represents a QR code associated with an event.
    QRcodeManager
    QRcodeManager The QRcodeManager class manages QR code operations within Firebase Firestore, including adding, retrieving, and searching for QR codes by event ID.
    QRcodeManager.onQRcodeFetchListener
    Interface for handling QR code fetch results.
    QRcodeManager.OnQRcodeSearchListener
    Interface for handling QR code search results.
    UserProfile
    UserProfile UserProfile class locally stores information about users data: deviceID name email phoneNumber pictureURL facilityURL allowNotifications notificationsArray joinedEvents isOrganizer isAdmin methods include: constructors getters setters getInitials
    UserProfileManager
    UserProfileManager The UserProfileManager class provides methods for managing user profiles, including adding, updating, deleting, and fetching user profiles in Firebase Firestore.
    UserProfileManager.OnDeleteListener
    Interface for handling the result of deleting the user profile or profile picture.
    UserProfileManager.OnUpdateListener
    Interface for handling the result of updating the user profile or profile picture.
    UserProfileManager.OnUploadPictureListener
    Interface for handling the result of uploading a profile picture.
    UserProfileManager.OnUserCheckListener
    Interface for handling the result of user existence check.
    UserProfileManager.OnUserProfileFetchListener
    Interface for handling the result of fetching a user profile.
